amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 109-450 to allow states and local agencies to petition to the Secretary of the Department of Homeland Security for approval to apply for grants under this section for any activity relating to prevention of, preparation for, response to, or recovery from acts of terrorism, that would otherwise be a Federal duty performed by Federal agencies and under agreement with a State or local government and a Federal agency.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bass amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
